```{r}
pea_data = read.csv(file = "./data/RawDataPeas.csv", header = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(pea_data, aes(x=pea_data$Diam, y=pea_data$Abs_Mass, color=pea_data$Trmt)) + geom_point()
```



```{r}
head(pea_data)
live = pea_data

for(i in nrow(pea_data):1) {
    if(pea_data[i,4] != "L") {
        live = live[-i,] 
    }
}

nrow(live)
head(live)

mean_lives = mean(live$Abs_Mass)
```

```{r}
head(pea_data)
boileds = pea_data

for(i in nrow(pea_data):1) {
    if(pea_data[i,4] != "B") {
        live = live[-i,] 
    }
}

nrow(boileds)
head(boileds)

mean_boileds = mean(boileds$Abs_Mass)

```
```{r}
ggplot(pea_data, aes(x=pea_data$Trmt, y=pea_data$Abs_Mass)) + geom_point() + geom_hline(yintercept = mean_boileds, size=1)
```

```{r}
ggplot(pea_data, aes(x=pea_data$Abs_Mass, fill=pea_data$Trmt)) + geom_histogram()

```

```{r}
plot(pea_data$Trmt, pea_data$Abs_Mass)
```

```{r}
head(pea_data)
taps = pea_data

for(i in nrow(pea_data):1) {
    if(pea_data[i,5] != "Tap") {
        taps = taps[-i,] 
    }
}

nrow(taps)
head(taps)

lats = pea_data

for(i in nrow(pea_data):1) {
    if(lats[i,5] != "Lat") {
        lats = lats[-i,] 
    }
}

nrow(lats)
head(lats)
```

```{r}
par(mfrow = c(1,2))
plot(taps$Trmt, taps$Abs_Mass, main = "tap roots", )
plot(lats$Trmt, lats$Abs_Mass, main = "lateral roots")
```


```{r}
par(mfrow = c(2,1))
ggplot(taps, aes(x=taps$Abs_Mass, fill=taps$Trmt)) + geom_histogram()
ggplot(lats, aes(x=lats$Abs_Mass, fill=lats$Trmt)) + geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
all_model = lm(Abs_Mass~ Trmt + Diam + Trmt*Diam, data = pea_data)

summary(model)
```

```{r}
tap_model = lm(Abs_Mass~ Trmt + Diam, data = taps)
summary(tap_model)
```

```{r}
lats_model = lm(Abs_Mass~ Trmt + Diam + Trmt*Diam, data = lats)
summary(lats_model)

```

```{r}
ggplot(pea_data, aes(x=pea_data$Diam, y=pea_data$Abs_Mass, color=Trmt)) + geom_point() + geom_hline(yintercept = mean_boileds, size=1)
```

```{r}
Smp_5 = pea_data
Smp_10 = pea_data
Smp_15 = pea_data
Smp_20 = pea_data
Smp_30 = pea_data
Smp_L = pea_data
Smp_B = pea_data

Smp_Matrices = c(Smp_5, Smp_10, Smp_15, Smp_20, Smp_30, Smp_L, Smp_B)
Smp_Trmt = c("5", "10", "15", "20", "30", "L", "B")



for(i in 1:7) {
  Placeholder = Smp_Matrices[i]  
  for(j in nrow(pea_data):1) {
        if(pea_data[j,4] != Smp_Trmt[i]) {
          Placeholder = Placeholder[-j,]
        }
    }
}

```

```{r}
par(mfrow = c(1,2))
with(pea_data[pea_data$Trmt == "5",], plot(pea_data$Diam, pea_data$Abs_Mass))
with(pea_data[pea_data$Trmt == "L",], plot(pea_data$Diam, pea_data$Abs_Mass))

```
